question: A.3 The reactor is initially subcritical with a Keff of 0.94.  Two (2) safety rods worth a total of 2.4% delta k/k are inserted into the core.  Which ONE of the following is the new K eff?

answers.feedback: Incorrect. Reference: Lamarsh, Introduction to Nuclear Engineering, 3rd Edition, page 336. Initial reactivity = (0.94 - 1)/0.94 = -0.0638 delta k/k;   + .024 delta k/k added by safety rods Final reactivity =  -.0638 + .024= -0.0398 delta k/k; Keff   = 1/(1 - [-0.0398])= 0.9617
